sqlMap.select: SELECT A.LIC_GRP_ID , A.MENU_ID , A.UPPER_MENU_ID , SF_STM2000_MENU_NM(A.LIC_GRP_ID, A.MENU_ID, '2') AS UP_MENU_NM , (SELECT UPPER_MENU_ID FROM STM2000 Z WHERE Z.LIC_GRP_ID = A.LIC_GRP_ID AND Z.MENU_ID = A.UPPER_MENU_ID) AS TWO_UPPER_MENU_ID , SF_STM2000_MENU_NM(A.LIC_GRP_ID, A.MENU_ID, '3') AS UPUP_MENU_NM , A.MENU_NM , A.MENU_TYPE_CD , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'ADM00001', A.MENU_TYPE_CD, '1') AS MENU_TYPE_NM , A.MENU_DESC , A.MENU_URL , A.MENU_PATH , A.MENU_IMG_URL , A.MENU_ICON , A.LVL , A.ORD , A.USE_CD , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'CMM00001', A.USE_CD, '1') AS USE_NM , A.REG_DTM , A.REG_USR_ID , A.REG_USR_IP , A.MODIFY_DTM , A.MODIFY_USR_ID , A.MODIFY_USR_IP , A.PRJ_TYPE , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'ADM00006', A.PRJ_TYPE, '1') AS PRJ_TYPE_NM , A.MODULE_TYPE , ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM STM2001 WHERE LIC_GRP_ID = A.LIC_GRP_ID AND MENU_ID = A.MENU_ID AND ROWNUM = 1 ) AS AUT_CNT FROM STM2000 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.MENU_ID = #menuId# ORDER BY ORD
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT SF_STM2000_GET_NEW_MENU_ID(#licGrpId#, #upperMenuId#) AS NEW_MENU_ID FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO STM2000 A ( LIC_GRP_ID , MENU_ID , UPPER_MENU_ID , MENU_NM , MENU_TYPE_CD , MENU_DESC , MENU_URL , MENU_PATH , MENU_IMG_URL , MENU_ICON , LVL , ORD , USE_CD , REG_DTM , REG_USR_ID , REG_USR_IP , MODIFY_DTM , MODIFY_USR_ID , MODIFY_USR_IP , PRJ_TYPE , MODULE_TYPE ) VALUES ( #licGrpId# , #newMenuId# , #upperMenuId# , #menuNm# , #menuTypeCd# , #menuDesc# , #menuUrl# , #menuPath# , #menuImgUrl# , #menuIcon# , #lvl# , #ord# , #useCd# , SYSDATE , #regUsrId# , #regUsrIp# , SYSDATE , #regUsrId# , #regUsrIp# , #prjType# , #moduleType# )
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM STM2000 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.MENU_ID = #menuId#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE STM2000 A SET UPPER_MENU_ID = #upperMenuId# , MENU_NM = #menuNm# , MENU_TYPE_CD = #menuTypeCd# , MENU_DESC = #menuDesc# , MENU_URL = #menuUrl# , MENU_PATH = #menuPath# , MENU_IMG_URL = #menuImgUrl# , MENU_ICON = #menuIcon# , LVL = #lvl# , ORD = #ord# , USE_CD = #useCd# , REG_DTM = SYSDATE , REG_USR_ID = #regUsrId# , REG_USR_IP = #regUsrIp# , MODIFY_DTM = SYSDATE , MODIFY_USR_ID = #modifyUsrId# , MODIFY_USR_IP = #modifyUsrIp# , PRJ_TYPE = #prjType# WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.MENU_ID = #menuId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT A.LIC_GRP_ID , A.PRJ_ID ,A.AUTH_GRP_ID , A.MENU_ID FROM STM2001 A , STM2000 B WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = B.LIC_GRP_ID AND A.MENU_ID = B.MENU_ID AND A.MENU_ID = #menuId# AND B.PRJ_TYPE = #prjType#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM STM2001 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.AUTH_GRP_ID = #authGrpId# AND A.MENU_ID = #menuId#
sqlMap.sql:
SELECT ROWNUM RN, T.* FROM ( SELECT A.PRJ_ID , A.AUTH_GRP_ID , A.AUTH_GRP_NM , NVL(A.AUTH_GRP_DESC, ' ') AS AUTH_GRP_DESC , A.CREATE_DT , A.USE_CD , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'CMM00001', A.USE_CD, '1') AS USE_NM , A.ORD , A.USR_TYP , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'ADM00004', A.USR_TYP, '1') AS USR_TYP_NM , A.ACCEPT_USE_CD , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'CMM00001', A.ACCEPT_USE_CD, '1') AS ACCEPT_USE_NM , TO_CHAR(A.REG_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REG_DTM , A.REG_USR_ID , A.REG_USR_IP , TO_CHAR(A.MODIFY_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS MODIFY_DTM , A.MODIFY_USR_ID , A.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM PRJ2000 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.PRJ_ID = 'ROOTSYSTEM_PRJ' ORDER BY A.ORD ASC, A.AUTH_GRP_NM ASC ) T WHERE 1=1
AND T.AUTH_GRP_NM LIKE '%'||#searchTargetData#||'%'
AND T.AUTH_GRP_DESC LIKE '%'||#searchTargetData#||'%'
AND T.USE_CD = #searchTargetData#
AND T.ACCEPT_USE_CD = #searchTargetData#
AND T.USR_TYP = #searchTargetData#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT Z.* FROM (
) Z WHERE 1=1 AND Z.RN BETWEEN (#firstIndex#+1) AND #lastIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM (
) Z
SELECT NVL(MAX(A.ORD), 0)+1 AS NEXT_ORD FROM PRJ2000 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.PRJ_ID = 'ROOTSYSTEM_PRJ'
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT NVL( SUBSTR(NEW_AUTH_GRP_ID, 1, 11) || LPAD( (TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(NEW_AUTH_GRP_ID, 12, 5)) + 1) , 5, '0') , 'AUT' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '00001' ) AS NEW_REQ_ID FROM ( SELECT MAX(AUTH_GRP_ID) AS NEW_AUTH_GRP_ID FROM PRJ2000 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.PRJ_ID = 'ROOTSYSTEM_PRJ' AND A.AUTH_GRP_ID LIKE 'AUT' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '%' )
INSERT INTO PRJ2000 ( LIC_GRP_ID, PRJ_ID, AUTH_GRP_ID, AUTH_GRP_NM, AUTH_GRP_DESC, CREATE_DT, USE_CD, ORD, USR_TYP, ACCEPT_USE_CD, REG_DTM, REG_USR_ID, REG_USR_IP, MODIFY_DTM, MODIFY_USR_ID, MODIFY_USR_IP ) VALUES ( #licGrpId#, 'ROOTSYSTEM_PRJ', #newAuthGrpId#, #authGrpNm#, #authGrpDesc#, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), #useCd#, #ord#, #usrTyp#, #acceptUseCd#, SYSDATE, #regUsrId#, #regUsrIp#, SYSDATE, #regUsrId#, #regUsrIp# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE PRJ2000 SET AUTH_GRP_NM = #authGrpNm# , AUTH_GRP_DESC = #authGrpDesc# , USE_CD = #useCd# , ORD = #ord# , USR_TYP = #usrTyp# , ACCEPT_USE_CD = #acceptUseCd# , MODIFY_DTM = SYSDATE , MODIFY_USR_ID = #modifyUsrId# , MODIFY_USR_IP = #modifyUsrIp# WHERE 1=1 AND LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND PRJ_ID = 'ROOTSYSTEM_PRJ' AND AUTH_GRP_ID = #authGrpId#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM PRJ2000 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.PRJ_ID = 'ROOTSYSTEM_PRJ' AND A.AUTH_GRP_ID = #authGrpId#
DELETE FROM STM2001 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.PRJ_ID = 'ROOTSYSTEM_PRJ' AND A.AUTH_GRP_ID = #authGrpId#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.LIC_GRP_ID , A.MENU_ID , A.MENU_NM , A.UPPER_MENU_ID , SF_STM2000_MENU_NM(A.LIC_GRP_ID, A.MENU_ID, '2') AS UP_MENU_NM , (SELECT UPPER_MENU_ID FROM STM2000 Z WHERE Z.LIC_GRP_ID = A.LIC_GRP_ID AND Z.MENU_ID = A.UPPER_MENU_ID) AS UPUP_MENU_ID , SF_STM2000_MENU_NM(A.LIC_GRP_ID, A.MENU_ID, '3') AS UPUP_MENU_NM , COUNT(*) OVER(PARTITION BY SF_STM2000_MENU_NM(A.LIC_GRP_ID, A.MENU_ID, '3')) AS GRP_CNT , RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY SF_STM2000_MENU_NM(A.LIC_GRP_ID, A.MENU_ID, '3') ORDER BY ORD ASC) AS GRP_RANK , B.PRJ_ID , B.AUTH_GRP_ID , NVL(B.MAIN_YN, 'N') AS MAIN_YN , NVL(B.ACCESS_YN, 'N') AS ACCESS_YN , NVL(B.SELECT_YN, 'N') AS SELECT_YN , NVL(B.REG_YN, 'N') AS REG_YN , NVL(B.MODIFY_YN, 'N') AS MODIFY_YN , NVL(B.DEL_YN, 'N') AS DEL_YN , NVL(B.EXCEL_YN, 'N') AS EXCEL_YN , NVL(B.PRINT_YN, 'N') AS PRINT_YN , 'R' AS STATUS /* R:조회, C:등록, U:수정, D:삭제 */ , A.MENU_TYPE_CD , A.ORD , A.LVL , A.MODULE_TYPE FROM STM2000 A , (SELECT * FROM STM2001 WHERE 1=1 AND AUTH_GRP_ID = #authGrpId# AND LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND PRJ_ID = #prjId#) B WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = B.LIC_GRP_ID(+) AND A.MENU_ID = B.MENU_ID(+) AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId#
AND A.SYS_CD = '02'
AND A.USE_CD = '01' ) Z START WITH Z.UPPER_MENU_ID IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR Z.MENU_ID = Z.UPPER_MENU_ID OR Z.UPPER_MENU_ID = Z.UPUP_MENU_ID ORDER SIBLINGS BY Z.ORD ASC ) Y WHERE 1=1 AND Y.LVL = 3
